titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Pigment Blue 60.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4411)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on pigment blue 60.
